descriptionHtml:
A couple friends of mine wanted me to upload one of my characters, so here he is.

This is a racemenu preset, and as such you need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu
[/url]The mods below are what I use to get the look in the pictures.If you don't use them he won't look the same, but of course you can pass on the beards and brows and scars etc and choose vanilla replacements if you feel it's not needed.

The face textures I use for males are the smooth version of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141/?]High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox
[/url]
If you want the hair, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by apachii[/url]

The eyebrows are from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows by Hvergelmer
[/url]I also use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]Beards by Hvergelmer
[/url]  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]
[/url]And the eyes are from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D13722%26preview%3D&pUp=1]The Eyes of Beauty by LogRaam
[/url]
Lastly, if you really want the same look as the images, the texture for the scar is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?]Northborn Scars by Northborn
[/url]
To install, just place the file where the rest of your presets are and you'll see it in game with them.
I do hope you enjoy him!
author: Cyrus
